Package ohos.telephony

Class RadioStateObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.telephony.RadioStateObserver

  • public class RadioStateObserver
extends Object
    Monitors state updates of a device, including updates of the network state, signal strength, and cell information.

    You can use RadioInfoManager#addObserver to add the RadioStateObserver with a specific observer mask. The corresponding method is invoked when the state updates. You need to override the method to receive the state information. Access to certain information is permission-protected. You must declare the appropriate permissions in the profile of the application.

    You can use RadioInfoManager#removeObserver to delete the RadioStateObserver. The observer must be the same as that added.

    Since:
    1

      static int OBSERVE_MASK_SIGNAL_INFO
      Indicates an observer mask for signal strength updates.
      protected int slotId
      Indicates the slot ID to observe updates.

      RadioStateObserver​(int slotId)
      Callback will be invoked in the current thread, which must have a runner.

      Callback will be invoked in the specified runner thread.

      • OBSERVE_MASK_CELL_INFO

        public static final int OBSERVE_MASK_CELL_INFO
        Indicates an observer mask for cell information updates.

        Applications must have the ohos.permission.LOCATION permission to register this event.

      • RadioStateObserver

        public RadioStateObserver​(int slotId,
                          EventRunner runner)
        Callback will be invoked in the specified runner thread.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the slot ID you want to observe.
        runner - Indicates the event handler.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if an invalid runner is used.

    • Method Detail

      • onNetworkStateUpdated

        public void onNetworkStateUpdated​(NetworkState networkState)
        Called when the network state corresponding to a monitored slotId updates.

        The value of slotId is passed from the constructor during class initialization. You must override this method to observe these updates.

        Parameters:
        networkState - Indicates an instance of the NetworkState class.
        Since:
        1

      • onSignalInfoUpdated

        public void onSignalInfoUpdated​(List<SignalInformation> signalInfos)
        Called when the signal strength corresponding to a monitored slotId updates.

        The value of slotId is passed from the constructor during class initialization. You must override this method to observe these updates.

        Parameters:
        signalInfos - Indicates a list of instances of the classes derived from SignalInformation.
        Since:
        1
